key_risks: Geographic concentration in Philadelphia and Pennsylvania suburbs increases vulnerability to local economic downturns
Tenant concentration risk due to dependence on a limited number of major tenants
Cybersecurity breach on May 1, 2024, raising concerns about data security and operational disruptions
Market volatility and reduced office space demand due to remote work trends and pandemic impacts
Regulatory and environmental compliance challenges, particularly with zoning laws and sustainability standards
controversies: Cybersecurity incident involving unauthorized access to IT environment
Exposure to market-specific challenges due to geographic concentration
environmental_issues: Navigating complex sustainability standards and green building practices
social_issues: Impact of COVID-19 on tenant health and safety protocols, including amenity space closures
governance_issues: Cybersecurity vulnerabilities and potential reputational damage from data breaches
